text: Diego Tavera Ponce de Léon (died 1560) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Jaén (1555–1560)."Bishop Diego Tavera Ponce de Léon" Catholic- Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved August 27, 2016 ==Biography== On 17 July 1555, he was appointed during the papacy of Pope Paul IV as Bishop of Jaén. He served as Bishop of Jaén until his death on 28 April 1560. == References == ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:16th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Paul IV Category:1560 deaths
title: Diego Tavera Ponce de Léon
